game.shortDescription: 협동 호러(1-4인). 밤에 신비한 건물을 탐험하게 됩니다. 달을 찾아 살아서 돌아오세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Co-op horror (1-4 players). You are sent to explore a mysterious building at night. Find the Moon and try to return alive.

reviewHighlights.text: bought this game mainly for the vr mode and its very poorly made. might as well never added vr in the first place. i mean UEVR could achieve better re...
Too short for something that was enjoyable, and entertaining. Even though the whole project looks like a huge asset flip, it's genuinely so satisfying...
